line.text: TOMMY GIRL is classified as a refreshing, flowery fragrance. This feminine scent possesses a blend of a refreshing and energetic floral, with low notes of sandalwood and heather.
Fragrance Family: Fresh/Floral
Fragrance Top Notes: Black currant bud, apple, tangerine, mandarin, and spearmint.
Heart Notes: In the middle, heather, honeysuckle, violet, rose, magnolia, jasmine and lily.
Base Notes: Sandalwood and Cedarwood.
The following notes are combined to create this fresh floral perfume.
It is recommended for daytime wear.

Dunhill Desire for men is powerful and bold, this lustful fragrance is fresh and sensual. A refreshing, oriental and woody fragrance. This masculine scent possesses a blend of warm and sensual blend of fruits and wood, with low notes of vanilla and musk.
Fragrance Family: : Woody, Ambry.
Fragrance Style: Sexy.
Fragrance Top Notes: Lime, Neroli, Apple, Bergamot.
Heart Notes: Patchouli, Rose, Teak.
Base Notes: Vanilla, Musk, Labdanum.
Become the object of Desire with this scent of seduction.
It is recommended for romantic wear.
Boss is Clean, Fresh, Woody. It is a multifaceted fragrance that combines a cool fresh sparkle of fruit with a warm sensuous undertone.

Its fragrant nature explores essences of, apples and cinnamom. Blended with notes of clove, tagete and sandalwood.It has a clean and fresh top note which evolves into a warm, woody and sensual drydown.
Fragrance Family: Fresh, Green
Fragrance Top Notes Apple, Bergamot, Cinnamon.
Heart Notes: Geranium Leaves, Cloves, Cedarwood, Tagete.
Base Notes: Sandalwood, Cedarwood, Vetiver, Olivewood.
An unmistakeable masculine scent for the man who redefines success, selfconfident and sensuous.
Recommend Use: All Seasons.
Acqua di Gio for men is a light fresh modern clean scent that combines citrus notes, rosemary spiciness, jasmine, hint of wood and ocean breeze.
It has some of the freshest aquatic notes with no notes of citrus. Simple, light, refreshing, long lasting.
Fragrance Family: Aromatic.
Fragrance Top Notes: Jasmine, Rosemary, Hespiradic Notes.
Heart Notes: Persimmon Fruits, Marine Notes.
Base Notes: Cedar, Patchouli, White Musk, Rock Rose.
Become the object of Desire with this scent of seduction.

A Balanced Blend of Essential Oils That Gives A Luxurious Fragrance Experience. It Captures The Essence Of Freedom, Inspired By a Mediterranean Island Refuge. Enfold With Fresh Mingling Of Sea, Sun, and Earth In a Unique Fragrance Infused With Freshness, Purity and Vitality.
It is recommended for All Seasons.
Named BEST MEN'S FRAGRANCE In Several Well Known Magazines, Such as Allure's 'Best Of Beauty' October 2006 Issue.
212 for men is a refreshing, flowery fragrance possessing a blend of a floral, yet totally masculine tones . This sexy, spontaneous scent includes notes of citrus, musk and woods.
Fragrance Family: Fresh
Fragrance Top Notes: Citrus Leaves, Cut Green Grass, Spice Leaves.
Heart Notes: Grapefruit, Ginger, Mandarin, Green Pepper, Gardenia.
Base Notes: Sandalwood, Guaiac Wood, Insence, Transparent Musk.
It has a subtle, sensual and easy-to-wear fragrance with the personality of New York City.
It is recommended for All Seasons.

A fresh, masculine, playful scent Freshness of green apples and subtle floral accents are balanced with the ice of frozen Thuja and icy woods. Light and delicate oriental touches of Jasmine are interlaced with the spicy depth of cedarwood.
Mysterious patchouli toys with the masculine intoxication of exotic vetyver to explore a man's brooding sensuality.
Fragrance Family:Fresh, floral and woody
Fragrance Top Notes: Manzana Verde, Fresh Notes, Green Notes.
Heart Notes: Jasmine, Cedar Leaf.
Base Notes: Precious Woods, White Musk, Patchouli.
A fragrance inspired by the contrasts of purity and intoxication. The pure bitter and icy facets contrast the enticing and addictive qualities of Manzana Verde and precious wood notes.
It is Recommended for Everyday.

Pleasures is classified as a refreshing, flowery fragrance. With this feminine scent one can feel the sheer flowering, the shimmering translucency notes of White Lily, Black Lilac, White Peony and Violet Leaves. Accompanied by a hint of sandalwood.
Fragrance Family: Powdery - Sheer - Floral.
Fragrance Top Notes: White Lilies, Fresh Violet Leaves, Green Accord.
Heart Notes: Black Lilies, White Peony, Pink Roses, Jasmine, Karo Karounde blossoms, Baie Rose.
Base Notes: Sandalwood, Patchouli.
Spirited, yet elegant. Fresh, yet softly sensual. It surrounds the woman who wears it with a soft, romantic shimmer.
It is Recommended for Everyday.

cK One is a naturally clean, pure, and contemporary fragrance with a refreshingly new point of view. This light, relaxed scent is meant to be used lavishly. It can literally be splashed all over the body. It is an intimate fragrance, one that you need to be near to smell.
Fragrance Family: Fresh - Sexy.
Fragrance Top Notes: Bergamot, Cardamom, Fresh Pineapple, Papaya., Green tree accord.
Heart Notes: Hedione High Cis (derived from Jasmine), Violet, Rose, Nutmeg, Green tree accord.
Base Notes: Musk, Amber, Green tree accord.

cK One reflects the three basic elements: Individuality - the freedom everyone is looking for; Unity - speaks to a diverse group who share this attitude; Sexuality - a subtle, honest version of sexiness.
It is Recommended for all occassions.
Poison is the revolutionary fragrance that originated the legend of seduction.
POISON is classified as a luxurious, oriental, floral fragrance. This feminine scent possesses a blend of amber,honey, berries, and other spices.
A myth since its creation, the mysteriousness of this fragrance asserts daring and fatal seduction. This really is an invitation too tempting to resist.
Fragrance Family: Floral - Ambery.
Fragrance Top Notes: Coriander, plum, pimento, anise, rosewood.
Heart Notes: Rose, tuberose, orange blossom, honey, cinnamon, wild berries, cistus labdanum, carnation, jasmine.
Base Notes: Sandalwood, cedarwood, vetiver, musk, vanilla, heliotrope, opopanax...
This concentrated oil perfume fragrance is for women daring and provocative, enigmatic and mysterious, dazzling with its spicy heart notes.
A rich, opulent scent, ideal for cold winters and hot, hot evenings.
It is recommended for romanticwear.
Our interpretation of the Gucci favourite is a sharp, oriental, woody fragrance blended with floral gardenia, coriander seeds, jasmine, rose, and vanilla.
The bottle, which houses this oriental scent is wonderfully fragrant, rich, mysterious, pure and exotic concentrated oil perfumes.
Fragrance Family: Fresh, Crisp and Floral Fragrance.
Fragrance Top Notes: California Gardenia, South African Freesia, coriander Seeds.
Heart Notes: Madras Jasmine, Damascena Rose.
Base Notes: Vanilla, Java Patchouli, Bourbon Vetiver.
This isn't a fragrance for the shy or meek.
It is recommended for Romantic Evening Wear.

Amarige is a symbol of feminity, radiating and bursting with happiness,a zest for life and genorisity. The amarige woman is radiant and open minded, her heart felt joy is evident from her spontaneous, charming smile. It contains a cheerful, tender and sensual flower boquet (Gardenia, Mimosa and precious woods.

Classified As A Sharp, Oriental, Floral Fragrance. This Feminine Scent Possesses A Blend Of Violet, Mimosa, Soft Sweet Spices, And Orange Flowers. Accompanied By Fruity Notes Of Fresh Citrus, Melons, Peaches, And Plums. This romantic floral-fruity fragrance is rich with amber, sensual musk, vanilla and sparkling fruity notes of mandarin and neroli.
Fragrance Family: Oriental.
Fragrance Style: Sexy.
Fragrance Top Notes: Violet, Mimosa, Orange Flowers and Rosewood.
Heart Notes: Soft Sweet Spices, Citrus, Melons, Peaches and Plums.
Base Notes: Amber, sensual musk, vanilla ,mandarin and neroli.
Amarige expresses the emotion of love at first sight. A romantic scent of grace, warmth, and fantasy for a spirited, confident, spontaneous woman.
It is Recommended for Daytime.

Burberry For Women Is A Fresh And Sensual Fruity Oriental.Top Notes Mix The Sweet acidity of ripe Green Apple And Bright Citrus Of Bergamot With The Boldness Of Tagete And Marigold Flower. Heart Notes Embrace The Richness Of Jasmine, Sandalwood, Moss.
Fragrance Family: Oriental - Floral.
Fragrance Top Notes: Peach, Apricot Marigold, Mint, Lavender, Bergamot, Thyme, Green Apple.
Heart Notes: Black Currant, Geranium, Sandalwood, Moss, Cedar.
Base Notes:Jasmine, Amber, Vanilla ,Musk and Tonka Bean.
A classy signature scent for women.
It is recommended for daytime wear.
An aquatic floral scent with transparent wafts of lotus, freesia and cyclamen. The middle note of peony, lily and carnation underscores the perfume's character. The end note is a refined woody scent.
Fragrance Family: Floral and Fresh.
Fragrance Top Notes: Lotus, Freesia, Cyclamen.
Heart Notes: Rose Water, Fresh Peonies, Carnation, White Lilies and Lily of the valley.
Base Notes: Precious Woods, Osmanthus, Tuberose, Amberseed Sandal, Cedar and Musk .
Flowery, sensual and woody notes, the fragrance of clearness and transparency. Its translucent presence is both fresh and warm, light and lasting.
It is recommended for daytime Wear.

Black Xs is a seductive new scent that blends energy, charm and virility. a fresh sensual woody fragrance. It begins as a zesty, fruity fragrance opening with a burst of freshness . At its heart, is a sweet touch that seemlessly blends with the spicy charm of black cardamom and Cinnamon. The base is both lively and sensual, overloaded with woods and black amber.
Fragrance Family: Aromatic.
Fragrance Top Notes: Calabrian Lemon, kalamanzi, Sage and Tagetes.
Heart Notes: Cinnamon, Tolu Balm, Black Cardamom and Praline.
Base Notes: Palissandre Wood, Patchouli Ebony Wood, Black Amber.
A contemporary and sexy fragrance for men. A sensual and fresh new blend with an unexpected sweetness. For the man who isn't shy to bare some skin.
It is recommended for Evening wear.

Cool Water Is Classified As A Sharp, Flowery Fragrance. Bright. Brisk. Cheerful. This feminine scent possesses a blend of citrus, Peach, apple, Pineapple tangerine and balanced with a base note blend of vanilla, sandalwood, and hazelnut, balanced with Woody Notes and Blended with the scent of ocean air.posessing a blend of Citrus, Peach, apple, Pineapple tangerine, and balanced with a base note blend of vanilla, sandalwood, and hazelnut, balanced with Woody Notes and Blended with the scent of ocean air.
Fragrance Family: Fresh.
Fragrance Top Notes: Ozonic notes, Citrus, Pineapple,Blackcurrant, Honeydew Melon, Lotus blossom, water Lily.
Heart Notes: May Rose, Jasmine, Muguet.
Base Notes: Orris, Vetiver, Sandalwood, Peach, Mulberry.
It never fails to refresh.
It is recommended for daytime Wear.

Desire is a refreshing, oriental and woody fragrance. This masculine scent features top notes of bergamot, lime, neroli and apple. Its middle notes tease the senses with patchouli, rose and teak wood. Finally, its base notes excite with a blend of vanilla, musk and labdanum.
This masculine scent possesses a blend of: warm and sensual fruits and wood, with low notes of vanilla and musk.
Fragrance Family: Woody, Ambry.
Fragrance Top Notes: Lime, Neroli, Apple, Bergamot.
Heart Notes: Patchouli, Rose, Teak.
Base Notes: Vanilla, Musk, Labdanum.
Become the object of Desire with this scent of seduction. Desire for men is powerful and bold, this lustful fragrance is fresh and sensual.
It is recommended for daytime wear.

Exhilarating. Distinctive. Classic. A refreshing scent that's exhilarating and distinctly masculine. With a cool, crisp edge and a warm woodsy trail. Eternity for Men is the singular expression of the vitality and confidence that characterizes today's masculine sensibility.
This designer fragrance is a refreshing blend of spicy, sweet aromas.
Fragrance Family: Woody - Ambry.
Fragrance Top Notes: Mandarin, Lavender, Green Botanics.
Heart Notes: Jasmine, Basil, Geranium, Sage.
Base Notes:Sandalwood, Vetiver, Rosewood, Amber.

This designer fragrance is a refreshing blend of spicy, sweet aromas. Eternity for Men symbolizes the spirit of today's man: sensitive yet masculine, refined yet strong. 'He's a romantic dedicated to basic values - family, work, health, and happiness. A man at ease with himself, in his relationships and with his world', says Klein.
Eternity is a all around fragrance.

Black Musk, a dark, pungent, boiling cauldron of midnight scents. This oil is a strong, regal and highly potent fragrance. This is not a fragrance to be taken lightly in any way - it is an oil to be used with some prudence. Black Musk lends elegance to a composition, and as with most elegant things, the understated most clearly reflects that elegance.

Black Musk is associated with the element of Fire. It is like liquid sunlight, it has so much solar energy to it. This kind of potency can be useful for many positive effects. The strength of the oil can influence one's personal ambient atmosphere, and inspire self-assurance at times when this is weak or lacking in the individual.

Exotic, Euphoric, Aphrodisiac: The Aroma kindles thoughts of love and happiness, remembrance, and thankfulness. It comes on strong and leaves a lasting impression with whomever comes in contact with its boldness.
Fragrance Family: spicy, Orientel (deep)
Fragrance Family: Fresh, Green
Fragrance Notes: A shadowy concoction of black fragrance notes...rosemary, basil, amber, patchouli, cedar wood, leather, sandalwood, coriander, juniper and oak moss.
Musk's reputation as a powerful aphrodisiac has been well documented throughout history. It is the most popular and highly recommended fragrance.
DANGEROUS.....HEADY......FORBIDDEN.....SENSUAL....INTOXICATING....EXCITING and VERY ADDICTIVE.

White Musk is incredibly beautiful, fresh and clean, with subtle vanilla undertones. A fragrance to evoke warmth and compassion. This is one of the most popular fragrances. A soft and feminine musk with floral notes of Lily, Honeysuckle and Jasmine.

A soft and velvety signature scent, for every moment, forever sensual. A specially crafted perfume that blends elegance and sensuality. Gives one a feeling of eternal bliss. A smell that will sooth your mind, body and soul. And a sense of spirutuality to ones very existance.
Fragrance Family: Spicy, oriental (light)
Fragrance Top Notes: The top note, fresh and effervescent, from the sparkling note of Bergamot matches the Ylang Ylang freshness and the Piment Baies spice to give the perfume its modern character.
Heart Notes: The elegant flower heart, is a blend of delicate and refined Jasmine, precious rose, sophisticated Lily of the Valley and romantic Violet.
Base Notes: The bottom note is MUSK mixed with Patchouli, Amber, Vanilla and Vetyver, to achieve a sensual effect.
It mellows into a deliciously soft, sweet 'skin scent'.
The scent for the wedding night !!
